hero.title: Create professional invoices in seconds
hero.description: EasyInvoicePDF is a free, open-source tool that lets you create, customize, and download professional PDF invoices with real-time preview.
hero.noSignup: No sign-up required. 100% free and open-source.

features.title: Everything you need for professional invoicing
features.description: Our simple yet powerful invoice generator includes all the features you need to create professional invoices quickly.
features.comingSoon: Pro version and API coming soon

livePreview.title: Live Preview
livePreview.description: See your invoice update in real-time as you make changes, ensuring it looks exactly how you want.

shareableLinks.title: Shareable Links
shareableLinks.description: Generate links to share your invoices directly with clients without sending attachments.

instantDownload.title: Instant Download
instantDownload.description: Download your invoice as a PDF file with one click, ready to be sent or printed.

multiLanguage.title: Multiple Languages & Currencies
multiLanguage.description: Create invoices in ten languages (English, Polish, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Ukrainian, French, Italian, Dutch) with support for all major currencies and automatic formatting.

vatSupport.title: VAT Support
vatSupport.description: Automatically calculate VAT rates and totals with support for different tax jurisdictions.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Completely free and open-source. Use it online or host it yourself with full access to the code.
